properties.property: Helps keep you feeling clean and fresh all day

Warnings.Warning: Keep out of reach of children.
Avoid contact with eyes.
If swallowed, drink plenty of water and seek medical advice.
Do not use on aluminum or painted surfaces.
For best results, use within 6 months of opening.

properties.property: Solid soap bars such as Palmolive Moisture Care
Helps keep you feeling clean and fresh all day

Warnings.Warning: Do not use on broken skin..
Ask a doctor before use if you have kidney disease.
Stop use if rash or irritation occurs.
Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.
For best results, use within 6 months of opening.

properties.property: soap product that can clean skin and rid the body of dirt and germs
a proven antibacterial agent that is able to eliminate up to 99% of bacteria on the skin.

Warnings.Warning: Do not use this product on infants under 6 months of age.
When using this product avoid contact with eyes. If this happens, rinse thoroughly with water.
Stop use if rash or irritation occurs.
Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.
Keep out of reach of children, except under adult supervision.

properties.property: is also pH-balanced to help skin retain natural moisture rather than stripping it away
Made with a plant-based cleanser this white Beauty Bar even helps replenish nutrients lost during the cleansing process

Warnings.Warning: Do not use this product on infants under 6 months of age.
External use only
Stop use if rash or irritation occurs.
Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center right away.
Keep out of reach of children, except under adult supervision..
